an10.35:1.1: “Katihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannagatena bhikkhuna nissayo databbo”ti?
an10.35:1.2: “Dasahi kho, upali, dhammehi samannagatena bhikkhuna nissayo databbo.
an10.35:1.4: Idhupali, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu;
an10.35:1.6: patimokkham kho panassa vittharena svagatam hoti suvibhattam suppavattam suvinicchitam suttaso anubyanjanaso;
an10.35:1.7: patibalo hoti gilanam upatthatum va upatthapetum va;
an10.35:1.8: patibalo hoti anabhiratim vupakasetum va vupakasapetum va;
an10.35:1.9: patibalo hoti uppannam kukkuccam dhammato vinodetum;
an10.35:1.10: patibalo hoti uppannam ditthigatam dhammato vivecetum;
an10.35:1.14: Imehi kho, upali, dasahi dhammehi samannagatena bhikkhuna nissayo databbo”ti.
